name: news_v2_list_trending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeking_alpha.
Tool description: Query for news, market moving, price quotes, chart, indices, analysis from investors and experts, etc...
API description: Fetches a list of trending news from the Seeking Alpha API.

size.description: The number of items per response, with a maximum of 40. Defaults to 20.

since.description: Unix timestamp (Epoch timestamp) to filter data from this date onwards. Can be used together with the 'until' parameter to filter data by date range. Defaults to None.

until.description: Unix timestamp (Epoch timestamp) to filter data up to this date. Can be used together with the 'since' parameter to filter data by date range. Defaults to None.
